Description: Bright, Spacious, 6BR/3BA duplex with efficient access to both T and bus routes! This unit features hardwood floors throughout, high 14' ceilings, an open floor plan and lots of natural light, exposed beams, living room/dining room, modern, fully applianced kitchen with granite counters, tons of storage space, dishwasher, disposal, and extra refrigerator, six large, equal bedrooms, three modern baths, and laundry in unit!
